titleStmt.title: Charles by the grace of God, King of Great Britaine ... forsamekle as wee beeing resolved to proceed in the matters referred to us by the submissions concerning the few fearmes and few meales of erections, teynds of other mens lands ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Second pt. of title from text.
At head of title: God saue the King.
Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
"Giuen vnder our signet at Haly-rud-house the sixteene daye of Iulij and of our raigne the fourth yeare. 1628."
Reproduction of original in the Town House (Aberdeen, Scotland). Charter Room.
